title: Enhancing App Development Practical Skills: Gifted Education Specialized Development Program: Blended Learning-Based Social Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental concepts of gifted education and intermediate-level knowledge in social studies
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners enhance instructional design competencies by applying gifted education theories to social studies contexts

Learners will observe three social problem-solving cases of gifted students in a VR simulation environment, derive two core strategies per case using provided analytical tools (scenario mapping, behavior pattern tracking), and write a comparative analysis report.

Learners will evaluate three peer posts on an asynchronous discussion board using a structured feedback form (clarity, logic, practicality) and submit a 1-page teaching-learning strategy improvement plan reflecting at least five feedbacks received.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
